President Donald J. Trump today announced his intent to appoint the following individual to a key position in his Administration:Bruce Hamilton of Texas to be the designated Chairman of the Defense Nuclear Facilities Safety Board.President Donald J. Trump today announced his intent to appoint the following individuals to be Members of the Advisory Committee for Trade Policy and Negotiations for terms of four years:
